# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its true value to be well above $10000. Considering its exceptional quality and potential impact on your business, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $15000. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you're interested in discussing further details or have any questions, please let me know. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
